title: HOW TO BECOME AN EQUIPMENT DEALER

tasks.task: Determine necessary steps for starting a tractor attachment business
subtasks: Research specific manufacturers and distributors of tractor attachments
Contact manufacturers/distributors to inquire about purchasing and pricing for new attachments
Consider forming a legal entity, such as an LLC, for business protection and organization
Evaluate financing options and minimum orders required for inventory purchase
Understand credit terms and payment schedules from suppliers
